General.Name: Kainantu Resources Ltd
General.Description: Kainantu Resources Ltd. operates as a gold mining company in Papua New Guinea. It also explores for copper and precious metals. The company's property portfolio includes the KRL South and KRL North projects located in the Kainantu region, Papua New Guinea; Kili Teke project; and May River project The company is based in Singapore.
General.Address: No.19-01 Royal group Building, Singapore, Singapore, 048693
